main.name: Nicolas Valencia
main.description: Perennial student of live, inspired by the convergence of technology, nature and human imagination
main.bio: Born in Colombia, raised in Canada and Japan. I'm a software engineer that believes improving communication in technology can lead to more robust goals and enhanced solutions.

resume.skillmessage: Software engineer specialized in designing and managing infrastructure apps to improve software development performance and inter-team collaboration. The combination of my communication and technical skills allow me to position as a leader that galvanizes team cooperation and provide unique solutions to my clients based on their needs.

education.degree: BS Electronic Engineering and Computer Science.
education.description: • Research in image cluster algorithms to analyze Cancer cell CT-scans.
education.description2: • First non-asian foreign student to graduate within the top 10% GPA in the faculty.
education.description3: • Third place in a National competition for creating an eye tricking device that can accurately control a cpu's mouse.

work.title: Sr. Software Development Engineer
work.description: • Lead a team of 6 people from India, Japan and USA to create dashboard services for clients in the PlayStation network QA automation teams. The success of this team helped streamline Development-QA feedback that increased the test cycle performance, quickly analyzing test code coverage and reporting bugs before the final product release.
work.description2: • Scrum QA leader of three client apps for the PS4, achieving automation rate of over 90% at the time of production deployment.
work.description3: • Co-wrote a science article on how to create objective test cases for UI application based on mathematical graph theory.

work.title: Image Sensor Design Engineer
work.description: • Lead architect of custom pixel circuits design and image processing automated QA for image recognition image sensors.
work.description2: • Team leader for sensor simulation and evaluation with developers in Japan, Belgium and United States. Proactive facilitation between teams lead to clear communication and agreement in role and responsibilities.
work.description3: • Designed the parameters for in-house face recognition algorithms for image sensors used by tier-one smartphone clients.
